results.title: AMPK-mediated autophagy pathway activation promotes DeltaFosB degradation to improve levodopa-induced dyskinesia.
results.text_hl: Overall, our results support the @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@-mediated autophagy pathway as a novel therapeutic target for @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesia_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004409 @@@LID@@@ and also indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is a promising therapeutic candidate for @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesia_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004409 @@@LID@@@.

citations.NLM: Liu K, Zhang Z, Xu Y, Wu Y, Lian P, Ma Z, Tang Z, Zhang X, Yang X, Zhai H, Zhang L, Xu Y, Cao X. AMPK-mediated autophagy pathway activation promotes DeltaFosB degradation to improve levodopa-induced dyskinesia. Cell Signal. 2024 Mar 1;118():111125. PMID: 38432574

results.title: Metformin regulates astrocyte reactivity in Parkinson's disease and normal aging.
results.text_hl: We previously showed that co-treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and 3,4-dihydroxyphenyl-l-alanine (@CHEMICAL_Levodopa @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007980 @@@l-DOPA@@@) prevented the development of @CHEMICAL_Levodopa @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007980 @@@l-DOPA@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesia_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004409 @@@dyskinesia@@@ in a @CHEMICAL_Oxidopamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016627 @@@6-hydroxydopamine@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Oxidopamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016627 @@@6-OHDA@@@)-lesioned animal model of @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@.

citations.NLM: Ryu YK, Go J, Park HY, Choi YK, Seo YJ, Choi JH, Rhee M, Lee TG, Lee CH, Kim KS. Metformin regulates astrocyte reactivity in Parkinson's disease and normal aging. Neuropharmacology. 2020 Sep 15;175():108173. PMID: 32497590

results.title: Protective effect of metformin against rotenone-induced parkinsonism in mice.
results.text_hl: This study showed that 50 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ given orally daily, beginning 3 d before @CHEMICAL_Rotenone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012402 @@@rotenone@@@ injection and continuing for 4 weeks following @CHEMICAL_Rotenone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012402 @@@rotenone@@@ injection, significantly ameliorated @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesia_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004409 @@@dyskinesia@@@, increased the number of @GENE_TH @GENE_21823 @@@TH@@@-positive neurons, and mitigated the activation of microglia in the SN in @CHEMICAL_Rotenone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012402 @@@rotenone@@@-induced @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang DX, Chen AD, Wang QJ, Xin YY, Yin J, Jing YH. Protective effect of metformin against rotenone-induced parkinsonism in mice. Toxicol Mech Methods. 2020 Jun;30(5):350-357. PMID: 32189544

results.title: Metformin Inhibits the Development of L-DOPA-Induced Dyskinesia in a Murine Model of Parkinson's Disease.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Inhibits the Development of @CHEMICAL_Levodopa @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007980 @@@L-DOPA@@@-Induced @<m>DISEASE_Dyskinesia_Drug_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004409 @@@Dyskinesia@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@Murine@@@ Model of @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's Disease@@@.
